name: Pummeling Charge

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, Pummeling Style; base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th.

sections.text: You can charge and make a full attack or flurry of blows at the end of your charge as part of the charge action. You can use Pummeling Charge in this way only if all of your attacks qualify for using Pummeling Style against a single target.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You cannot make a full attack on a charge.
sections.name: Normal

prerequisites: base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th
description: Your charge ends with a mobile combo.
